nodes.text: Unidentified New Republic reptilian diplomat's species
This reptiloid race had large frills on their necks and broad tails. A member of this species was a New Republic diplomat.

This species was illustrated by Terryl Whitlatch for The Wildlife of Star Wars: A Field Guide, published by Chronicle Books in 2001. They resemble members of the Viis Empire, from the Alien Chronicles series also illustrated by Whitlatch.
